text: Amhi pratyeka manasala apalya mata-pityasi sadâ€Œvartana karanyaci sikavana dili ahe. Tathapi jara te ha prayatna karatila ki tumhi majhyasobata tyala sahabhagi karuna ghyave, jyace tumhala jnana nahi tara tyance mhanane man'ya karu naka. Tumha sarvanna paratuna majhyacakade yayace ahe, maga mi tya pratyeka gostisi, ji tumhi karita hote avagata karavina
